name: Cyclo: Rental Bikes for Everyone
description: Cyclists look for bicycles that they can rely on. More often than not, this takes precedence over everything else. Being a cyclist myself, I know how difficult it is to find good quality cheap bicycles for rent. Reliability is also a bone of contention because they usually give out very often. A high-end bicycle market is something that is untapped and the only major roadblock is safety.
